detail_desc: Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons down the front. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently shaped waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette. For the matching trousers, search on 0391772.
